name: Gremblo's Tavern
description:
Gremblo's Tavern is a game about working as a bartender in a shady underground bar full of gremlins, chaos, and flying bottles. You'll have to work through 3 days full of speed drink mixing, counter top cleaning and radio tuning. throw bottles at the roof, mess up all orders and go bankrupt or spill your drinks on your recipe book, at the end of the day what's a bar full of gremlims like without all the stress?

Also, who's Gremblo?

Up and Down keys - Main menu
Space - Selecting in the main menu
Left mouse - pick up/interact with objects
Right mouse - pour drinks
R - reset the mixer if you have it picked up

Also there's a radio.

A game by OtherThatGuy, GreenPixel, Osmium, PunStar, and Charizmatic
